alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:55PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory ending this evening, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday, snow expected. Total additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected, particularly along higher passes on I-15 through this evening. Widespread winter driving conditions can be expected Tuesday morning into Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
